short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily organize, group, and customize your tabs!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use this extension to consolidate your tabs into groups! By clicking the group label you can expand the group to see all individual tabs, or compress it so only the group label is showing. 

Customize your experience with a variety of color options, and update group names whenever you want!
